infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Wildcard action in IAM Policy
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: The IAM policy allows all actions on resource
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Granting permission to perform any action is against 'least privilege' principle
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `statement.action` attribute to specific actions e.g. `s3:ListBucket`

remediation.cloudformation: Set `Action` attribute in `Properties.PolicyDocument` to specific actions e.g. `s3:ListBucket`
remediation.terraform: Set `statement.action` attribute to specific actions e.g. `s3:ListBucket`

iacDescription.issue: The IAM policy allows all actions on resource
iacDescription.impact: Granting permission to perform any action is against 'least privilege' principle
iacDescription.resolve: Set `statement.action` attribute to specific actions e.g. `s3:ListBucket`

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: IAM Policy grants full administrative rights
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: The IAM Policy grants all permissions to all resources
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Any identity with this policy will have full administrative rights in the account
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `Actions` and `Resources` attributes to limited subset, e.g `Actions: ['s3:Create*']`

remediation.cloudformation: Set `Actions` and `Resources` attributes to limited subset, e.g `Actions: ['s3:Create*']`
remediation.terraform: Set `Actions` and `Resources` attributes to limited subset, e.g `Actions: ['s3:Create*']`

iacDescription.issue: The IAM Policy grants all permissions to all resources
iacDescription.impact: Any identity with this policy will have full administrative rights in the account
iacDescription.resolve: Set `Actions` and `Resources` attributes to limited subset, e.g `Actions: ['s3:Create*']`

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Non-Encrypted SNS Topic
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: The SNS topic is not encrypted at rest
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: That should someone gain unauthorized access to the data they would be able to read the contents.
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `kms_master_key_id` attribute to KMS key

remediation.cloudformation: Set `KmsMasterKeyId` attribute to KMS key for example `alias/aws/sns`
remediation.terraform: Set `kms_master_key_id` attribute to KMS key

iacDescription.issue: The SNS topic is not encrypted at rest
iacDescription.impact: That should someone gain unauthorized access to the data they would be able to read the contents.
iacDescription.resolve: Set `kms_master_key_id` attribute to KMS key

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: S3 bucket MFA delete control disabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: S3 bucket will not enforce MFA login on delete requests
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Object could be deleted without stronger MFA authorization
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Follow instructions in `https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/MultiFactorAuthenticationDelete.html` to manually configure the MFA setting. For AWS provider < v4.0.0 set `versioning.mfa_delete` attribute to `true` in aws_s3_bucket resource. For AWS provider >= v4.0.0 set 'versioning_configuration.mfa_delete` attribute to `Enabled`. The terraform change is required to reflect the setting in the state file

remediation.terraform: Follow instructions in `https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/MultiFactorAuthenticationDelete.html` to manually configure the MFA setting. For AWS provider < v4.0.0 set `versioning.mfa_delete` attribute to `true` in aws_s3_bucket resource. For AWS provider >= v4.0.0 set 'versioning_configuration.mfa_delete` attribute to `Enabled`. The terraform change is required to reflect the setting in the state file

iacDescription.issue: S3 bucket will not enforce MFA login on delete requests
iacDescription.impact: Object could be deleted without stronger MFA authorization
iacDescription.resolve: Follow instructions in `https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/MultiFactorAuthenticationDelete.html` to manually configure the MFA setting. For AWS provider < v4.0.0 set `versioning.mfa_delete` attribute to `true` in aws_s3_bucket resource. For AWS provider >= v4.0.0 set 'versioning_configuration.mfa_delete` attribute to `Enabled`. The terraform change is required to reflect the setting in the state file

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Non-Encrypted SNS Topic
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: The SNS topic is not encrypted at rest
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: That should someone gain unauthorized access to the data they would be able to read the contents.
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `kms_master_key_id` attribute to KMS key

remediation.cloudformation: Set `KmsMasterKeyId` attribute to KMS key for example `alias/aws/sns`
remediation.terraform: Set `kms_master_key_id` attribute to KMS key

iacDescription.issue: The SNS topic is not encrypted at rest
iacDescription.impact: That should someone gain unauthorized access to the data they would be able to read the contents.
iacDescription.resolve: Set `kms_master_key_id` attribute to KMS key

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: S3 bucket versioning disabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: S3 bucket versioning is disabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Changes or deletion of objects will not be reversible
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: For AWS provider < v4.0.0, set `versioning.enabled` attribute to `true`. For AWS provider >= v4.0.0, add aws_s3_bucket_versioning resource.

remediation.terraform: For AWS provider < v4.0.0, set `versioning.enabled` attribute to `true`. For AWS provider >= v4.0.0, add aws_s3_bucket_versioning resource.

iacDescription.issue: S3 bucket versioning is disabled
iacDescription.impact: Changes or deletion of objects will not be reversible
iacDescription.resolve: For AWS provider < v4.0.0, set `versioning.enabled` attribute to `true`. For AWS provider >= v4.0.0, add aws_s3_bucket_versioning resource.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: SNS topic is not encrypted with customer managed key
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: SNS topic is not encrypted with customer managed key
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Scope of use of the encryption key cannot be controlled via KMS/IAM policies
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `kms_master_key_id` attribute to a customer managed key id

remediation.cloudformation: Set `Properties.KmsMasterKeyId` attribute to a customer managed key id
remediation.terraform: Set `kms_master_key_id` attribute to a customer managed key id

iacDescription.issue: SNS topic is not encrypted with customer managed key
iacDescription.impact: Scope of use of the encryption key cannot be controlled via KMS/IAM policies
iacDescription.resolve: Set `kms_master_key_id` attribute to a customer managed key id

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: S3 server access logging is disabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: The s3 access logs will not be collected
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: There will be no audit trail of access to s3 objects
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: For AWS provider < v4.0.0, add `logging` block attribute. For AWS provider >= v4.0.0, add aws_s3_bucket_logging resource.

remediation.terraform: For AWS provider < v4.0.0, add `logging` block attribute. For AWS provider >= v4.0.0, add aws_s3_bucket_logging resource.

iacDescription.issue: The s3 access logs will not be collected
iacDescription.impact: There will be no audit trail of access to s3 objects
iacDescription.resolve: For AWS provider < v4.0.0, add `logging` block attribute. For AWS provider >= v4.0.0, add aws_s3_bucket_logging resource.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: SNS topic is not encrypted with customer managed key
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: SNS topic is not encrypted with customer managed key
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Scope of use of the encryption key cannot be controlled via KMS/IAM policies
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `kms_master_key_id` attribute to a customer managed key id

remediation.cloudformation: Set `Properties.KmsMasterKeyId` attribute to a customer managed key id
remediation.terraform: Set `kms_master_key_id` attribute to a customer managed key id

iacDescription.issue: SNS topic is not encrypted with customer managed key
iacDescription.impact: Scope of use of the encryption key cannot be controlled via KMS/IAM policies
iacDescription.resolve: Set `kms_master_key_id` attribute to a customer managed key id

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: ALB does not drop invalid headers
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: The application load balancer is not set to drop invalid headers.
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Maliciously crafted headers may be accepted by the load balancer
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `drop_invalid_header_fields` to `true`

remediation.terraform: Set `drop_invalid_header_fields` to `true`

iacDescription.issue: The application load balancer is not set to drop invalid headers.
iacDescription.impact: Maliciously crafted headers may be accepted by the load balancer
iacDescription.resolve: Set `drop_invalid_header_fields` to `true`

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Load balancer is internet facing
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Load balancer is internet facing
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Increases attack vector reachability
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `internal` attribute to `true`

remediation.terraform: Set `internal` attribute to `true`

iacDescription.issue: Load balancer is internet facing
iacDescription.impact: Increases attack vector reachability
iacDescription.resolve: Set `internal` attribute to `true`

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Public IPs are automatically mapped to instances
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Instances launched in this subnet will automatically have public IP assigned
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Instances will be potentially accessible over public internet, which may lead to unauthorized access
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `map_public_ip_on_launch` attribute  with value `false`

remediation.terraform: Set `map_public_ip_on_launch` attribute  with value `false`

iacDescription.issue: Instances launched in this subnet will automatically have public IP assigned
iacDescription.impact: Instances will be potentially accessible over public internet, which may lead to unauthorized access
iacDescription.resolve: Set `map_public_ip_on_launch` attribute  with value `false`

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Rule allows open egress
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: The security group rule allows open egress
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Open egress can be used to exfiltrate data to unauthorized destinations, and enable access to potentially malicious resources
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `cidr_blocks` attribute to specific ranges e.g. `192.168.1.0/24`

remediation.cloudformation: Set `Properties.SecurityGroupEgress.CidrIp` attribute to specific ranges e.g. `192.168.1.0/24`
remediation.terraform: Set `cidr_blocks` attribute to specific ranges e.g. `192.168.1.0/24`

iacDescription.issue: The security group rule allows open egress
iacDescription.impact: Open egress can be used to exfiltrate data to unauthorized destinations, and enable access to potentially malicious resources
iacDescription.resolve: Set `cidr_blocks` attribute to specific ranges e.g. `192.168.1.0/24`

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: AWS Security Group Rule allows public access
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: That inbound traffic is allowed to a resource from any source instead of a restricted range
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: That potentially everyone can access your resource
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `cidr_blocks` attribute to specific IP range only, e.g. `192.168.1.0/24`

remediation.cloudformation: Set `CidrIp` attribute to specific IP range only, e.g. `192.168.1.0/24`
remediation.terraform: Set `cidr_blocks` attribute to specific IP range only, e.g. `192.168.1.0/24`

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: X-ray tracing is disabled for Lambda function
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Amazon X-Ray tracing is not enabled for Lambda function
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Trace logs will not be available during investigation
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `tracing_config.mode` attribute to `Active` or `PassThrough`

remediation.terraform: Set `tracing_config.mode` attribute to `Active` or `PassThrough`

iacDescription.issue: Amazon X-Ray tracing is not enabled for Lambda function
iacDescription.impact: Trace logs will not be available during investigation
iacDescription.resolve: Set `tracing_config.mode` attribute to `Active` or `PassThrough`

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: EC2 API termination protection is not enabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: To prevent instance from being accidentally terminated using Amazon EC2, you can enable termination protection for the instance
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Without this setting enabled the instances can be terminated by accident. This setting should only be used for instances with high availability requirements. Enabling this may prevent IaC workflows from updating the instance, for example terraform will not be able to terminate the instance to update instance type
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `disable_api_termination` attribute  with value `true`

remediation.terraform: Set `disable_api_termination` attribute  with value `true`

iacDescription.issue: To prevent instance from being accidentally terminated using Amazon EC2, you can enable termination protection for the instance
iacDescription.impact: Without this setting enabled the instances can be terminated by accident. This setting should only be used for instances with high availability requirements. Enabling this may prevent IaC workflows from updating the instance, for example terraform will not be able to terminate the instance to update instance type
iacDescription.resolve: Set `disable_api_termination` attribute  with value `true`

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Non-Encrypted root block device
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: The root block device for ec2 instance is not encrypted
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: That should someone gain unauthorized access to the data they would be able to read the contents.
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `root_block_device.encrypted` attribute to `true`

remediation.cloudformation: Set `BlockDeviceMappings.Encrypted` attribute of root device to `true`
remediation.terraform: Set `root_block_device.encrypted` attribute to `true`

iacDescription.issue: The root block device for ec2 instance is not encrypted
iacDescription.impact: That should someone gain unauthorized access to the data they would be able to read the contents.
iacDescription.resolve: Set `root_block_device.encrypted` attribute to `true`

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Logging is not enabled on storage bucket
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Logging is not enabled on storage bucket
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Usage information will not be collected. This may impact ability to determine who accessed data stored in the bucket
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `logging` block attribute

remediation.terraform: Set `logging` block attribute

iacDescription.issue: Logging is not enabled on storage bucket
iacDescription.impact: Usage information will not be collected. This may impact ability to determine who accessed data stored in the bucket
iacDescription.resolve: Set `logging` block attribute

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Google storage bucket does not use customer-managed keys to encrypt data
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Google storage bucket does not use customer-managed keys to encrypt data
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: Google will manage the encryption keys on its servers and could access the data without authorization
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Use encryption keys from self-managed key management service and configure the `encryption` block accordingly.

remediation.terraform: Use encryption keys from self-managed key management service and configure the `encryption` block accordingly.

iacDescription.issue: Google storage bucket does not use customer-managed keys to encrypt data
iacDescription.impact: Google will manage the encryption keys on its servers and could access the data without authorization
iacDescription.resolve: Use encryption keys from self-managed key management service and configure the `encryption` block accordingly.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Object versioning is not enabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Object versioning is not enabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: The accidental or malicious changes to object will not be reversible
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `versioning.enabled` attribute to `true`

remediation.terraform: Set `versioning.enabled` attribute to `true`

iacDescription.issue: Object versioning is not enabled
iacDescription.impact: The accidental or malicious changes to object will not be reversible
iacDescription.resolve: Set `versioning.enabled` attribute to `true`

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: VPC Flow Logs for VPC Network Subnets Disabled
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Ensure that VPC Flow Logs is enabled for every subnet in a VPC Network
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: No visibility into network traffic within this subnet
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Define a `flow_logs` field with `aggregation_interval`, `flow_sampling` and `metadata` subfields.

remediation.terraform: Define a `flow_logs` field with `aggregation_interval`, `flow_sampling` and `metadata` subfields.

iacDescription.issue: Ensure that VPC Flow Logs is enabled for every subnet in a VPC Network
iacDescription.impact: No visibility into network traffic within this subnet
iacDescription.resolve: Define a `flow_logs` field with `aggregation_interval`, `flow_sampling` and `metadata` subfields.

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: GCP Compute Firewall allows public access
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: That inbound traffic is allowed to a resource from any source instead of a restricted range
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: That potentially everyone can access your resource
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set source_ranges to specific IP range only, e.g. `192.168.1.0/24`

remediation.terraform: Set source_ranges to specific IP range only, e.g. `192.168.1.0/24`

iacDescription.issue: That inbound traffic is allowed to a resource from any source instead of a restricted range
iacDescription.impact: That potentially everyone can access your resource
iacDescription.resolve: Set source_ranges to specific IP range only, e.g. `192.168.1.0/24`

infrastructureAsCodeIssues.title: Unrestricted SSH access
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.issue: Compute firewall allows all access to the SSH port
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.impact: SSH service may be accessible over the internet which defeats network segmentation controls
infrastructureAsCodeIssues.resolve: Set `source_ranges` attribute to specific IP range for example `192.168.0.0/24`

remediation.terraform: Set `source_ranges` attribute to specific IP range for example `192.168.0.0/24`

iacDescription.issue: Compute firewall allows all access to the SSH port
iacDescription.impact: SSH service may be accessible over the internet which defeats network segmentation controls
iacDescription.resolve: Set `source_ranges` attribute to specific IP range for example `192.168.0.0/24`
